title: Will a new constitution in Mali lead the way to civilian rule?
description: Mali's military rulers are proposing changes to its constitution, which would reinforce presidential powers.

title: War in Ukraine must stop, South Africa’s Ramaphosa tells Putin
description: South Africa President says the war is having a 'negative impact' on the African continent and many other countries.

title: Four Hajj delegations leave besieged Gaza to Mecca
description: Thousands of pilgrims left from the Rafah crossing to Cairo's airport and then to Mecca.

title: Cyclone Biparjoy weakens, thousands leave relief camps in India
description: Officials said electricity had been restored in many villages but hundreds more were still without power.

title: Sudan’s warring sides agree to new 72-hour ceasefire
description: The truce brokered by the US and Saudi Arabia will go into effect on Sunday.

title: Fears of ethnic cleansing mount in Sudan’s West Darfur
description: Multiple ceasefires and international mediation efforts have failed to stop the conflict from escalating.

title: US senators introduce bill for restoration of Tunisia’s democracy
description: The legislation acknowledges that President Kais Saied has taken steps to undermine Tunisia's democratic institutions.

title: Foodbanks can help tackle East Africa’s hunger crises
description: Foodbanking builds on African traditions of generosity and communal help and can play a key role in redistributing food.

title: Al Jazeera wins seven Drum Online Media Awards
description: AJ English Digital wins for website, interactives and opinions sections.

title: Saudi, Iran foreign ministers meet in Tehran amid warming ties
description: It's the first visit by a Saudi official to Iran in more than seven years, in a rapprochement deal brokered by China.

title: Ban on Israelis could see Indonesia lose World Beach Games
description: If Bali loses hosting rights for the Olympic-recognised event, it could hurt the country's standing, analysts warn.

title: Sudanese continue to flee Darfur violence in dire circumstances
description: Thousands flock to Chad as UN calls for access to western Sudan to deliver much-needed aid amid humanitarian crisis.

title: Euro-Med Monitor calls on Tunisia to release hunger striker Atig
description: Jailed Ennahdha party leader Sahbi Atig is no longer able to walk or talk, his wife says.

title: Chile’s justice minister: Pinochet-era wounds must remain visible
description: As Chile marks 50 years since Augusto Pinochet’s military coup, Luis Cordero Vega discusses its dark legacy.

title: Dozens die as northern India swelters under heatwave
description: Officials say at least 34 people have died in the past two days as heatwave takes toll in Uttar Pradesh state.

title: Silvio Berlusconi: Media mogul and master politician
description: The late Italian politician's career was powered by his media might, and he pioneered a brash brand of demagoguery.

title: What’s behind the EU’s financial aid offer to Tunisia?
description: European Union offers cash-strapped Tunisia more than $1bn in financial aid to help boost the nation's battered economy.

title: UN agencies seek ‘decisive action’ from EU after Greece tragedy
description: International Organization for Migration and UN Refugee Agency say EU must put 'safety' at centre of Mediterranean plan.

title: Dozens dead, abducted in rebel attack on Uganda school: Officials
description: Ugandan forces launch hot pursuit as they blame the ISIL-linked group for the deadly attack near DRC border.

title: NATO focuses on underwater assets amid Russia sabotage concerns
description: NATO says Russian ships mapped critical underwater infrastructure in sea areas of the Western military alliance.

title: Putin confirms nukes in Belarus, US slates Russian sabre-rattling
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin says the West is doing everything to inflict strategic defeat on Moscow in Ukraine.

title: N Korea opens key party meeting to discuss defence, diplomacy
description: N Korea leader Kim Jong Un attends meeting on diplomatic, defence strategy amid 'changed international situation'.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 479
description: As the war enters its 479th day, these are the main developments.

title: Dominican Republic denies Canada consulted on Haitian aid office
description: Foreign Minister Roberto Alvarez has cast doubt on a proposal for a Canadian-led aid bureau on Dominican territory.
